item.title: Poetry is a saner package manager for Python
item.description: Like many, I enjoy Python and the versatility and speed of development it provides. But, to me Python tooling is a big deal breaker.

item.title: Setting up NeoVim for Godot
item.description: Recently I’ve been using Godot a bit to mess around with game development and I wanted to have autocompletion working with CoC.
